code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CartPage=_ref=>{let{cartItems,removeFromCart,updateQuantity}=_ref;const total=cartItems.reduce((sum,item)=>sum+item.price*item.quantity,0);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-view",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Shopping Bag"}),cartItems.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Your bag is empty."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[cartItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.image,alt:item.name,style:{width:'60px',borderRadius:'5px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"remove-link",onClick:()=>removeFromCart(item.id),children:"Remove"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"qty-controls",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"qty-btn",onClick:()=>updateQuantity(item.id,-1),children:"-"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:item.quantity}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"qty-btn",onClick:()=>updateQuantity(item.id,1),children:"+"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("strong",{children:["\u20B9",(item.price*item.quantity).toLocaleString('en-IN')]})]},item.id)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-total",style:{textAlign:'right',marginTop:'30px',borderTop:'2px solid #eee',paddingTop:'20px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["Grand Total: \u20B9",total.toLocaleString('en-IN')]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"add-btn",style:{width:'auto',padding:'15px 40px'},children:"Checkout Now"})]})]})]});};export default CartPage;
